name: Ultimate Super Bean
description: Join an epic Free-For-All Against Other Bean, Or Call Truces. Collect Skins To Show Your Skill, Use Weapons That Cycle Out Often So Gameplay Never Gets Boring,  Explore The Map That Changes Every Month, Wall Phase To Travel Faster And Sneak Up On Other Beans, And Don't Get Shot! Shoot Other Beans To Get Gems That Are Used To Buy Skins In The Shop. Be The ULTIMATE BEAN!!
